```{r setup rgl hook}
library(knitr)
library(rgl)
```

```{r setup webgl hook}
knit_hooks$set(webgl = hook_webgl)
```

```{r make webgl plot, webgl = TRUE}
x <- sort(rnorm(1000))
y <- rnorm(1000)
z <- rnorm(1000) + atan2(x, y)

plot3d(x, y, z, col = rainbow(1000))
```
